00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Collections.Generic;
00025 using System.Linq;
00026 using System.Text;
00027 using System.Data;
00028 using Utilities.SQL.DataClasses.Interfaces;
00029 #endregion
00030 
00031 namespace Utilities.SQL.DataClasses
00032 {
00036     public class Column
00037     {
00038         #region Constructor
00039 
00043         public Column()
00044         {
00045             this.ForeignKey = new List<Column>();
00046             this.ForeignKeyColumns = new List<string>();
00047             this.ForeignKeyTables = new List<string>();
00048         }
00049 
00065         public Column(string Name,string ColumnType,int Length,bool Nullable,
00066             bool Identity,bool Index,bool PrimaryKey,bool Unique,string ForeignKeyTable,
00067             string ForeignKeyColumn,string DefaultValue,ITable ParentTable)
00068         {
00069             this.Name = Name;
00070             this.ForeignKey = new List<Column>();
00071             this.ForeignKeyColumns = new List<string>();
00072             this.ForeignKeyTables = new List<string>();
00073             this.ParentTable = ParentTable;
00074             this.DataType = (SqlDbType)System.Enum.Parse(typeof(SqlDbType), ColumnType, true);
00075             this.Length = Length;
00076             this.Nullable = Nullable;
00077             this.AutoIncrement = Identity;
00078             this.Index = Index;
00079             this.PrimaryKey = PrimaryKey;
00080             this.Unique = Unique;
00081             this.Default = DefaultValue;
00082             AddForeignKey(ForeignKeyTable, ForeignKeyColumn);
00083         }
00084 
00085         #endregion
00086 
00087         #region Public Properties
00088 
00092         public string Name { get; set; }
00093 
00097         public SqlDbType DataType { get; set; }
00098 
00102         public int Length { get; set; }
00103 
00107         public List<Column> ForeignKey { get; set; }
00108 
00112         public bool PrimaryKey { get; set; }
00113 
00117         public bool Nullable { get; set; }
00118 
00122         public bool Unique { get; set; }
00123 
00127         public bool Index { get; set; }
00128 
00132         public bool AutoIncrement { get; set; }
00133 
00137         public string Default { get; set; }
00138 
00142         public ITable ParentTable { get; set; }
00143 
00144         #endregion
00145 
00146         #region Private Variables
00147 
00148         private List<string> ForeignKeyTables { get; set; }
00149         private List<string> ForeignKeyColumns { get; set; }
00150 
00151         #endregion
00152 
00153         #region Public Functions
00154 
00160         public void AddForeignKey(string ForeignKeyTable, string ForeignKeyColumn)
00161         {
00162             if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(ForeignKeyTable) || string.IsNullOrEmpty(ForeignKeyColumn))
00163                 return;
00164             ForeignKeyColumns.Add(ForeignKeyColumn);
00165             ForeignKeyTables.Add(ForeignKeyTable);
00166         }
00167 
00171         public void SetupForeignKeys()
00172         {
00173             for (int x = 0; x < ForeignKeyColumns.Count; ++x)
00174             {
00175                 Database TempDatabase = ParentTable.ParentDatabase;
00176                 if (TempDatabase != null)
00177                 {
00178                     foreach (Table Table in TempDatabase.Tables)
00179                     {
00180                         if (Table.Name == ForeignKeyTables[x])
00181                         {
00182                             foreach (Column Column in Table.Columns)
00183                             {
00184                                 if (Column.Name == ForeignKeyColumns[x])
00185                                 {
00186                                     ForeignKey.Add(Column);
00187                                     break;
00188                                 }
00189                             }
00190                             break;
00191                         }
00192                     }
00193                 }
00194             }
00195         }
00196 
00197         #endregion
00198     }
00199 }
